scenario:
A professional investor is making changes to their portfolio, citing the need for improvement. Key changes include:

A major portfolio change involves increasing exposure to real estate investment trusts (REITs), specifically Prologis (PLD), by 10% to 15% of the overall portfolio. This move is driven by the investor's positive outlook on the logistics and e-commerce sectors, which they believe will continue to grow due to the shift towards online shopping.

The investor also plans to make an important retirement account change, allocating a larger portion of their 401(k) to a tax-loss harvesting strategy. This approach aims to minimize tax liabilities by offsetting capital gains with losses from other investments.

The investor's colleague, Tyler Crowe, has also made a similar change to their portfolio, increasing exposure to REITs, including PLD, by 10% to 15%.
